desc: John's Amish Country sells various Wellness Shots, Oils, Lotions, Creams and Chapsticks online and at local Arizona Farmers Markets. Get Raw Shots include organic ginger, turmeric, lemon and honey all in a one-a-day wellness shot. BOOST your immunity, vitality and get ready for the day. Shop now.

layout.text: John's Amish Country sells various Wellness Shots, Oils, Lotions, Creams and Chapsticks online and at local Arizona Farmers Markets.
Receive 20% off at check out when spending $180 or more on half-gallon and quarts.
Receive 20% off your first order on pint shot mix. Use code PINT20.
